fields.description:
Android N introduces a variety of features for notifications:
1. Direct replies
2. Bundled notifications
3. Custom views
4. Messaging Style

https://developer.android.com/preview/features/notification-updates.html

comments.body: Closing ticket as duplicate, with reference to the above comments and links.
